title: Game-Based Mathematics Instructional Design: Educational Game Development Course for Elementary Preservice Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics education theory, understanding of game principles
context.additional_context: Asynchronous collaborative learning environment utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can independently develop one elementary math game by applying educational game design principles (goal-mechanism-assessment).
Based on game-based learning theory, learners can implement three or more strategies to motivate learners.
Learners can verify educational effectiveness through game testing and data analysis in an LMS environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
